user.about: Philosophy is considered a science but it is difficult to say, when one has to compare with an ordinary science, for example biology, or chemistry.

following.name: Luis Suarez
following.about: Luis Alberto Suárez Díaz (born 24 January 1987) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a striker for Spanish club FC Barcelona and the Uruguay national team.

following.name: Rafael Nadal
following.about: Rafael Nadal Parera (born 3 June 1986) is a Spanish professional tennis player currently ranked world No. 8.

following.name: Manny Pacquiao
following.about: Emmanuel Dapidran Pacquiao (born December 17, 1978) is a Filipino professional boxer and politician, currently serving as Senator of the Philippines.

following.name: Serena Williams
following.about: Serena Jameka Williams (born September 26, 1981) is an American professional tennis player. The Women's Tennis Association (WTA) has ranked her world No.1 in singles on six separate occasions.

following.name: Michael Jordan
following.about: Michael Jeffrey Jordan (born February 17, 1963) is an American retired professional basketball player. Jordan played 15 seasons in the NBA for the Chicago Bulls and Washington Wizards.

following.name: Novak Djokovic
following.about: Novak Djokovic (born 22 May 1987) is a Serbian professional tennis player who is currently ranked world No. 2 in men's singles tennis by the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP).

followers.name: Dwyane Wade
followers.about: Dwyane Tyrone Wade Jr. (born January 17, 1982) is an American professional basketball player for the Chicago Bulls of the National Basketball Association(NBA)

followers.name: Lionel Messi
followers.about: Lionel Andrés Messi (born 24 June 1987) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish club FC Barcelona and the Argentina national team.

followers.name: Kobe Bryant
followers.about: Kobe Bean Bryant (born August 23, 1978) is an American retired professional basketball player and businessman. He played his entire 20-year career with the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association (NBA)

followers.name: Cristiano Ronaldo
followers.about: Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro (born 5 February 1985) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Spanish club Real Madrid and the Portugal national team.

followers.name: Neymar Jr.
followers.about: Neymar da Silva Santos Júnior (born 5 February 1992), commonly known as Neymar or Neymar Jr., is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish club FC Barcelona and the Brazil national team.

followers.name: Maria Sharapova
followers.about: Maria Yuryevna Sharapova (born April 19, 1987) is a Russian professional tennis player. A United States resident since 1994, Sharapova has competed on the WTA tour since 2001.

followers.name: Manu Ginóbili
followers.about: Emanuel David Ginóbili Maccari (born 28 July 1977) is an Argentine professional basketball player for the San Antonio Spurs of the National Basketball Association (NBA).
